info.author: Andrew Sterian
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Pyepix_ is a wrapper package for the ePiX_ mathematical plotting library. The
ePiX_ library supports C++ programs for creating mathematically accurate plots for use in LaTeX documents.
Pyepix_ provides a Python wrapper to this library thus allowing integration with Python's extensive
built-in library and extension packages. In addition, Pyepix_ frees the user from needing to learn C++,
obtaining a C++ compiler, and fighting with the C++ language.

.. _Pyepix: http://claymore.engineer.gvsu.edu/~steriana/Python
.. _ePiX: http://mathcs.holycross.edu/~ahwang/current/ePiX.html
info.name: pyepix
info.summary: Python Interface for the ePiX mathematical plotting library
info.html_description: Pyepix is a wrapper package for the ePiX mathematical plotting library. The ePiX library supports C++ programs for creating mathematically accurate plots for use in LaTeX documents. Pyepix provides a Python wrapper to this library thus allowing integration with Python’s extensive built-in library and extension packages. In addition, Pyepix frees the user from needing to learn C++, obtaining a C++ compiler, and fighting with the C++ language.
